alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 29 at 6:14PM EDT until August 29 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR MONROE COUNTY... At 613 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Flat Rock to Monroe to near Lambertville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Flat Rock around 620 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Newport, Cone, Estral Beach, Toledo Beach, Erie, South Rockwood, Woodland Beach, Stony Point, Bolles Harbor and Samaria. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
